title: Invest Wisely with Walt Sokira
description:
Walt Sokira started managing “important money” in August of 1987 when the Dow-Jones Industrial Average was at 2,660, the S&P 500 Index at 329 and the NASDAQ Composite was at 451. Walt defines "important money" as the "money people give their lives´ energies to gain. It often represents hard work, fulfillment of dreams and financial security." For over 30 years Walt has managed money for individuals, families, corporations and philanthropic organizations. He has worked for a large trust company, brokerage firm and owned his own independent Registered Investment Advisory firm for 17 years. This cumulative experience has developed into principles and beliefs that are now shared daily as the managing partner of Akron Wealth Advisors.

Walt earned his Bachelor Degree from The University of Akron and his M.B.A. from Kent State University. He firmly believes that education is a life-long process. Walt has taught as a visiting professor at Case Western Reserve University, Kent State University, The University of Akron and Youngstown State University. He has won numerous teaching awards and has educated over 10,000 students during his teaching tenure.
author_name: Walt Sokira, Director, Financial Advisor Baird

title: The Justin Spaulding Show
description:
Justin Spaulding has grown from zero to $100,000,000+ in real estate in less than a decade. And The Justin Spaulding Show is all about sharing that wisdom and advice, from real life experiences, to help other achieve awareness, strategy and tactics around:
-Money
-Personal Finances
-Business
-Real Estate
-Entrepreneurship
-Negotiation
-Sales
-Health
-Mindset
& more!

Justin shares everything from how he has built a real estate empire valued at over $100,000,000; sales changed his life, and strategies to use to have success in whatever it is you want to be successful at in life.

Justin graduated college in 2012 and was an NCAA All-American football player. Throughout college he read over 100 books on real estate, money, finance, and more. He was determined to then implement what he learned.

After graduation he got involved in sales and grew his team to the top of a direct sales company. He saved all of those earnings and bought a couple of four unit apartment buildings. Others wanted to start investing with him.

Today he has over 60 investors who have invested $20,000,000 into his private equity companies and today they own over 700 apartments and multiple commercial health care properties.

Justin plans to grow his real estate holdings to over 50,000 apartments in the coming years.

In March 2020, Justin started a "Prime Painters". They focus on painting his apartments, as well as other residential and commercial painting projects in Southern Wisconsin and Northern Illinois.

Please subscribe to the podcast and checkout his book here: https://justinspaulding.com/products/build-wealth-in-real-estate-book-pre-order.

title: Money Chill Out
description:
Hi, I am Marieka, and welcome to Money Chill Out! 
On this podcast, I want to dive into the world of the often unspoken topic of money. Effective personal finance management can be a great liberator but also a huge stress factor in our lives. After a 10y career on trading floors in London, I want to help demystify the intimidating world of finance and have an open, honest, and frank conversation. By opening the discussion I wish you identify yourself, learn, be inspired, and get empowered. 

Every other week, I will be joined by guests for a conversation on money, mindset, investment habits, and any best practices they abide by! 
So join me on this journey as we unpick the complexities of finance and get more comfortable talking about our money.

title: Economically Speaking
description:
Want to know why more than 250,000 people and hundreds of businesses call the Town of Babylon home? Then look no further… ‘Economically Speaking’ is your window into the business community right in your local neighborhood. Hosted by Babylon Industrial Development Agency CEO, Tom Dolan, this informational podcast serves to educate and communicate the latest economic development news in the town and surrounding region. 

This podcast will discuss housing, jobs, workforce development, real estate, economic inclusion, energy resources, business planning, transportation, small business loans, COVID impacts, and much more. Hear directly from our region’s experts about how we must tackle the Town’s challenges, opportunities, resource availability, and experiences. So here’s your look into the role of the IDA and our goal of helping the community grow.

We are Kass and Mitch - a full time value investing couple from Australia, who take contrarian bets when opportunities make sense. We are students of intelligent investing (we don’t think you ever graduate, do you?), practicing in the skill of value and the art of behavioural, hedged by the protection of macro.

To enjoy this podcast: You don’t need a mathematics degree. You don’t need to be an economics master. You don’t need to be a fund manager. 

You just need to be: Open to thinking differently. Curious to explore that difference. And financially literate to profit from it.

“It is impossible to begin to learn that which one thinks one already knows.” - Epictetus

title: Recon Labs
description:
Recon Labs is a podcast that showcases the many sides of successful entrepreneurship for military veterans.

Our Frontline Founders series focuses on technology entrepreneurship and veterans who have founded and built great technology companies.

Our Search & Acquire series focuses on veterans who have pursued small business ownership via entrepreneurship through acquisition, also known as search funds.

It's hard work to serve in the military. It's hard work to create and build a new technology company or to find, acquire and operate a small business successfully.

What about these veterans' service helped them build and lead their companies? What obstacles did they need to overcome? 

Recon Labs opens the aperture for current servicemembers and for veterans, and shows the general public the power of these veterans' hard work, integrity, flexibility, and humor in the face of ambiguity and challenges.

title: HVK Stevens | The Private Client Series
description:
Jeroen Peters
Jeroen Peters houdt zich bezig met fiscaal recht op het snijvlak van (inter)nationale inkomstenbelasting, estate planning en complexe vennootschapsrechtelijke transacties, beleggingsstructuren, goede doelen, privacy en vermogensoverdracht en herstructureringen. Hij werkt voor nationale en internationale families, ondernemers en zakelijke cliënten. Breed opgeleid als generalist heeft hij zich tijdens zijn carrière steeds verder gespecialiseerd op het gebied van private clients en alle onderwerpen waar zij mee te maken krijgen. 

Jeroen is sinds 2019 als Tax partner aan HVK Stevens verbonden. 

HVK Stevens
HVK Stevens richt zich op de advisering aan ondernemers, vennootschappen, private equity fondsen, goede doelen, vermogende particulieren, families, familiebedrijven. HVK Stevens is een gespecialiseerd boutique kantoor met meer dan 70 medewerkers op het gebied van tax, legal en consultancy. Het kantoor hanteert een integrale aanpak: de specialisten van HVK Stevens werken in multidisciplinaire teams samen aan een oplossing op maat. Het opbouwen van een persoonlijke relatie met de cliënt staat daarbij voorop.

Complexe materie op een eenvoudige manier uitleggen is een kunst die de specialisten bij HVK Stevens verstaan. Cliënten krijgen geen lange, theoretische uiteenzettingen, maar een concrete oplossing voor hun probleem in heldere taal.

HAVE IT ALL. You can.
Many people talk about how it is all about thinking the right thoughts to Succeed. 
How Your thoughts create Your Life.
So, can You change the way You think if it has not been Positive up until now? 
OF COURSE YOU CAN. 
This is what I did. And it worked!
I listened to my self-talk audios every night while I slept for years, until it was in my subconscious - my beliefs even now grow by hearing!
I listen to these audios every night while I sleep on repeat, each day a different self-talk because any negative self-talk from Your past can be overridden by positive - it may take 90 days or even a year but once it is in Your subconscious, YOU WILL SUCCEED!

On my Podcast I will also discuss my Books and Ideas.

This is for You - the most Magnificent, Powerful, Awesome You!
I honour the Greatness that You are!

Any insecurity can be turned into confidence - sometimes we just need a little guidance or mentorship by someone who truly wants the very Best for us - that was my wealthy aunty for me, and I hope my Books, Podcast and all else that I will share will be that for You.

With this my wish to You as that You live a truly Powerful, Beautiful, Purposeful, Rich, Wealthy Life and that You Prosper and Succeed!!

With all my heart,
Your Coach ESTHER

title: Fintech Podcast
description:
¡Bienvenidos a FINTECH PODCAST! El podcast de referencia para los entusiastas de la tecnología blockchain, inteligencia artificial, bitcoin, altcoins y finanzas. Únete a nosotros mientras exploramos el emocionante mundo de las criptomonedas y las innovaciones disruptivas que están transformando el panorama financiero.

Nuestro equipo de expertos analiza proyectos tecnológicos y blockchain, desglosando su funcionamiento y el impacto que podrían tener en diferentes sectores. Te mantendremos al tanto de las últimas noticias y tendencias en el mundo de las finanzas digitales, asegurándonos de que estés siempre al día con la información más relevante.

Con invitados especiales de renombre, entrevistaremos a los líderes y visionarios de la industria fintech, quienes compartirán sus conocimientos y perspectivas sobre las últimas innovaciones. Desde emprendedores hasta inversores y reguladores, exploraremos las voces que están dando forma al futuro de las finanzas.

Ya sea que seas un principiante curioso o un experto en la materia, FINTECH PODCAST es tu guía confiable para comprender los conceptos clave de la tecnología blockchain, la inteligencia artificial y las criptomonedas. Acompáñanos en este emocionante viaje mientras descubrimos cómo estas tecnologías están revolucionando el mundo financiero.

¡Suscríbete ahora a FINTECH PODCAST y mantente a la vanguardia de la evolución financiera!

title: The Degen Report
description:
A Cardano based podcast that is focused on bridging the gap between the Degens and  the Normies. 

How will we do this??
Our plan is to be a podcast that relates to EVERYONE! However for the Degens we will also be talking about what is going on in Cardano. By making this both a Cardano/everything podcast we will be making it easier for the Normies to get involved in Cardano, while also keeping the Cardano Degens laughing even through a bear market.

IS THAT ALLL????!!!! 

FUCK NO!! The Degen Report is planning on being the launching pad! We will also be releasing YouTube videos, that lean more towards the comedic side of Cardano. These will consist of everything from Clips from the podcast, to doing Cardano based tier lists
We also plan on doing livestreams! Whether this be us talking to another project about what they are about, playing games with the community or even doing karaoke with the community. We plan on doing it allllll! 

WHY???!
We at The Degen Report believe that the Cardano Community has been missing a ton of good comedic Influencer based content. Thats where we come in! We plan on filling that whole with content ranging from youtube videos, podcast clips, to livestreams! 

Well anyways if you have made it this far... then you are for sure a Degen!
So welcome to The Degen Report!

title: Financial Literacy for All Initiative
description: 43% and 66%. According to the Milken Institute, these are the percentages of adults and teenagers, respectively, who are financially illiterate in the United States. title: Out on a Limb - Where Traditional Finance and the New Digital Economy Converge
description:
Tim Enneking gives high-level commentary on current events and other global macroeconomic factors that are shaping the fiat/crypto spaces and their growing inter-relationship. This podcast is designed for a broad range of audiences including those only beginning their journey into traditional finance and/or the digital asset space to those with an intermediate to professional understanding of global economics. Tim gives brief, thematic, and highly-focused updates and viewpoints in an easy-to-digest and time-efficient format. 

Mr. Enneking is the Chief Investment Officer of Mana Companies Asset Management, a nine-digit multi-generational family office and trust based in San Diego. Tim is also the founder and Principal of Digital Capital Management, LLC (“DCM”). DCM manages Crypto Asset Fund, which was awarded the "#1 hedge fund in 2021" in terms of absolute performance. He is also currently engaged as a Partner at three other crypto asset management companies, Psalion, BlockLabs and Hexis Management. Prior to founding DCM, Mr. Enneking was the founder and investment manager for the Crypto Currency Fund (“CCF”), one of the world’s first private funds focused on cryptocurrencies. Simultaneously, in 2013, he was engaged to manage the world’s first Bitcoin fund. He also has extensive international M&A experience, having completed more than 70 transactions with an aggregate transaction value of over US$12 billion. Tim is a retired Lieutenant Colonel and was a company commander during Desert Storm 1. He is Airborne, Ranger, and French Commando qualified. During his time in the military, he worked at embassies in London, Brussels, Moscow and Paris. Tim has five university degrees, all in international business and law. He speaks English, near-native Russian and French, and German.

Do you have updates, questions, or concerns? Do you need a pep talk? We always have time to educate and encourage you. That’s why we’ve created an after-hours line for you. What is FXT Navigator™? 

FXT Navigator is a complete set of institutional calibre tools and analytics developed by traders, for traders. It can help retail clients to access cutting-edge trading capabilities, and greatly enhance their insight and knowledge as investors.

About Michael and Tim
Tim Muirhead is the Chief Investment Officer of Australian-licensed fund manager Arbidyne Capital. He is a veteran trader with a background in engineering, and previously worked with renowned proprietary trading firm Tibra Capital. Tim is also the co-founder of Fignition Private Investment.   

Michael Berman is the Chief Executive Officer of FXTRADING.com. He has over 20 years of experience in the allocation of trading capital and product development. title: Indian Market Story
description:
Welcome to 'The Indian Market Story', an enlightening journey through India's remarkable economic transformation over the past few decades.

From a humble per capita GDP of $370 in 1990 to an impressive $2200 in 2023, and with sights set on a projected $5000 by 2030, India's economic voyage is nothing short of an inspiring saga.

Each week, we delve into the dynamic factors that have contributed to this growth, through in-depth conversations with a diverse array of guests. Our lineup features everyone from seasoned businessmen and market mavens to cutting-edge entrepreneurs and finance whizzes, all lending their unique insights into the forces shaping India's economic landscape.

We explore a broad spectrum of markets, including equity, real estate, venture capital, private businesses, and fixed income markets. Through stories, insights, and expert analysis, we dissect the factors that have led to this incredible growth and what the future might hold.

'The Indian Market Story' is more than just a podcast; it's an exploration of a nation's journey to economic prosperity. Whether you're an investor keen on understanding the Indian market, an entrepreneur looking for inspiration, or someone intrigued by economic narratives, this podcast promises to provide a comprehensive understanding of one of the most exciting economic transformations of our time. Join us as we unravel the compelling narrative of India's economic ascent – the triumphs, the challenges, the innovation, and the sheer determination that have shaped the Indian Market Story.

title: The Conscious Capitalist's Journey
description:
Welcome to "The Conscious Capitalist's Journey", a podcast that takes you on a transformative journey of entrepreneurship, real estate investing, and conscious capitalism. Your host, Chris, an entrepreneur born in Hawaii from immigrant parents started 10 businesses and failed - Then succeeded with three. Today, he has multiple streams of income. Through his journey, he inspires us all to believe that financial freedom is possible with the right mindset.

Join Chris on a wild and honest journey as he breaks free from an 80-hour-a-week job in Japan and takes the leap into entrepreneurship. From investing in stocks and crypto to losing a lot of money, yet gaining valuable lessons from the school of hard knocks, Chris shares his raw and crazy experiences. He delves into how real estate investing completely changed the game for him, utilizing his background in finance to start creating wealth and achieve financial freedom. Follow his path and learn how you too can attain life-changing wealth for generations to come by investing in apartment buildings with him.

A key aspect of this podcast is that Chris is currently on his journey towards financial freedom and still considers himself in the "rat race". Regardless, he continues on his pursuit of knowledge: To learn and develop new mindsets, strategies, skills, and investment techniques that can help him and others get out of it.

Throughout his journey, including his successes and failures, Chris aims to share his experiences and inspire his listeners to understand that the road to success is often filled with obstacles and challenges. Listeners can learn and grow together, gaining insights and inspiration to achieve their own financial goals and pursue success despite the darkness that may come their way.

The core of his work and lifestyle is conscious capitalism, which is a practice of investing and managing money with a focus on creating positive social and environmental outcomes, in addition to financial returns.

"The Conscious Capitalist's Journey" is not just about becoming financially free, but also becoming the most giving person you can be, all the while enjoying the fruits of your labor.

This podcast speaks to aspiring entrepreneurs who are working jobs that they hate, creatives who struggle to make money but want to pursue their dreams and passions, children of immigrant parents, and parents who want to buy back their time. Chris's mission is to inspire a mindset change and address problems of financial and mental poverty, helping listeners on their journey towards overcoming debt and achieving their financial goals.

Join Chris on "The Conscious Capitalist's Journey" and let him inspire you to create generational wealth and make a positive impact in the world.

The audio can be accessed through the courts and sometimes through administration websites of bankrupt companies. But it takes a few steps to access audio and play audio accessed that way. Thanks to amazing streaming technology including Podcasting 2.0 I am able to make the audio accessible to people around the world who may be interested in reviewing. With additional technology I am able to provide transcripts for some of the audio recordings, in the form of unofficial computer auto generated written transcripts. These transcripts can assist people who are hearing impaired, and other people who prefer to read along. The unofficial transcripts can be translated into other languages for convenience, by people using Google Translate and other translation tools available on the internet. I hope access is useful to you in some way, and thank you for listening.

title: The Dave & Marcia Show
description:
About The Dave and Marcia Show

- Our listeners are financial advisors from all channels and all ages. Many think they provide adequate retirement income advice for clients nearing and living in retirement. Many think they are building relationships with women. Most will find out too late they are not.

- We want the listeners to get new, different, and interesting information from the show that they can use to understand the reality out there. They’ll build from:

o Real women. Real stories. Each woman’s journey is fascinating and filled with unique steps and stumbles and successes. As a society, we don’t celebrate her journey. They are looking for much more than a spreadsheet, a quarterly report on earnings, and a pie chart. But most advisors are not delivering.

o And income. Dave and Marcia are veterans of the retirement savings and retirement income industry. They know women have been left out of the conversation. They know financial advisors are struggling to understand women clients and win their assets for the long-term. And, they know how women get left out of the money decisions, due to a combination of laws that put her in the backseat and financial advisors who don’t include her in the process or conversation.

- In this podcast, we’ll help advisors change course before it’s too late. To help women successfully manage through retirement and have the income they need and want, changes are necessary. Advisors will hear from:

o Boomer women about their life’s journey and where they are going next.

o From Gen X women who feel left out of the conversations despite their success.

o And, from Millennial women who are completely reinventing life as we know it.

It’s no secret women will control the majority of wealth in the next 10 years. It’s estimated that more than two-thirds of wealth will be held by women in the US by 2030. That’s some $30 Trillion that will change hands over the next several years.

Our mission is to educate financial advisors, wealth managers, and insurance advisors in every channel on how to best serve this powerful market. First from a boomer women’s perspective. Then how to further adapt to handle new challenges and a different definition of “retirement” for younger women.

description:
Ik Bouw Zo biedt jongvolwassenen de kans om in te stromen in de bouwsector met uitzicht op een vaste baan. Deelnemers krijgen een opleiding en een werkplek bij een erkend leerbedrijf. Om uitval tijdens de opleiding te voorkomen, wordt er intensieve begeleiding geboden. We gaan in gesprek met jongeren over hun ervaring met betrekking tot de bouw, de begeleiding, de kansen en de aandachtspunten.

De doelgroep zijn jongvolwassenen in de leeftijd van 16 t/m 30 jaar, die minder aansluiting ervaren met de arbeidsmarkt en behoefte hebben aan gelijke kansen en persoonlijke ontwikkeling. Deze jongeren vallen vaak tussen wal en schip en hebben nog geen werk gevonden. Hun talenten zijn nog niet direct zichtbaar en ze zijn zoekende.

title: Warren Buffett - Buffettology Audiobook by David Clark and Mary Buffett
description: In the world of investing, the name Warren Buffett is synonymous with success and prosperity—now you can learn how Warren Buffett did it and how you can, too.Building from the ground up, Buffett chose wisely and picked his stocks with care, in turn amassing the huge fortune for which he is now famous. Mary Buffett, former daughter-in-law of this legendary financial genius and a successful businesswoman in her own right, has teamed up with noted Buffettologist David Clark to create Buffettology, a one-of-a-kind investment guide that explains the winning strategies of the master.-Learn how to approach investing the way Buffett does, based on the authors' firsthand knowledge of the secrets that have made Buffett the world's second wealthiest man-Use Buffett's proven method of investing in stocks that will continue to grow over time-Master the straightforward mathematical equipments that assist Buffett in making investments-Examine the kinds of companies that capture Buffett's interest, and learn how you can use this information to make your own investment choices of the futureComplete with profiles of fifty-four "Buffett companies"—companies in which Buffett has invested and which the authors believe he continues to follow—Buffettology can show any investor, from beginner to savvy pro, how to create a profitable portfolio.

title: The Man Who Solved the Market By Gregory Zuckerman Audiobook (Full Audiobook)
description:
Jim Simons is the greatest moneymaker in modern financial history. His record bests those of legendary investors, including Warren Buffett, George Soros and Ray Dalio. Yet Simons and his strategies are shrouded in mystery. The financial industry has long craved a look inside Simons’s secretive hedge fund, Renaissance Technologies and veteran Wall Street Journal reporter Gregory Zuckerman delivers the goods.

After a legendary career as a mathematician and a stint breaking Soviet codes, Simons set out to conquer financial markets with a radical approach. Simons hired physicists, mathematicians and computer scientists - most of whom knew little about finance - to amass piles of data and build algorithms hunting for the deeply hidden patterns in global markets. Experts scoffed, but Simons and his colleagues became some of the richest in the world, their strategy of creating mathematical models and crunching data embraced by almost every industry. Simons and his team used their wealth to upend the worlds of politics, philanthropy and science. They weren’t prepared for the backlash.

In this fast-paced narrative, Zuckerman examines how Simons launched a quantitative revolution on Wall Street, and reveals the impact that Simons, the quiet billionaire king of the quants, has had on worlds well beyond finance.

  • MORE IN 2019

title: Jesse Livermore's Methods of Trading in Stocks Audiobook (Full Audiobook)
description: Livermore was an American stock trader. He was famed for making and losing several multi-million dollar fortunes and short selling during the stock market crashes in 1907 and 1929. Apart from his success as a securities speculator, Livermore left traders a working philosophy for trading securities that emphasizes increasing the size of one's position as it goes in the right direction and cutting losses quickly. The materials published in these articles represent Livermore's collective wisdom on stock trading. Chapters include: Preparing for the day's work Arrangement of the trading office How to read the tape Commitments and limits of risk How to keep capital turning over Kind of stocks in which to trade Pyramiding And much more

title: Hedge Fund Market Wizards: How Winning Traders Win (Full Audiobook)
description:
This audiobook provides fascinating insights into the hedge fund traders who consistently outperform the markets, in their own words.

From bestselling author, investment expert, and Wall Street theoretician Jack Schwager comes a behind-the-scenes look at the world of hedge funds, from 15 traders who've consistently beaten the markets. Exploring what makes a great trader a great trader,Hedge Fund Market Wizards breaks new ground, giving rlisteners rare insight into the trading philosophy and successful methods employed by some of the most profitable individuals in the hedge fund business.

 Presents exclusive interviews with 15 of the most successful hedge fund traders and what they've learned over the course of their careers  Includes interviews with Jamie Mai, Joel Greenblatt, Michael Platt, Ray Dalio, Colm OShea, Ed Thorp, and many more  Explains 40 key lessons for traders  Joins Stock Market Wizards, New Market Wizards, and Market Wizards as the fourth installment of investment guru Jack Schwager's acclaimed bestselling series of interviews with stock market experts

A candid assessment of each trader's successes and failures, in their own words, the audiobook shows listeners what they can learn from each, and also outlines 40 essential lessonsfrom finding a trading method that fits an investor's personality to learning to appreciate the value of diversificationthat investment professionals everywhere can apply in their own careers.

Bringing together the wisdom of the true masters of the markets, Hedge Fund Market Wizards is a collection of timeless insights into what it takes to trade in the hedge fund world.

title: Weekend Compounder
description: Discover the intricate world of global equities with "The Weekend Compounder Podcast." Each week, we zoom in on the ever-evolving landscapes of the US and Indian stock markets, delivering curated insights for both novice and seasoned investors. Our segments cater to a spectrum of investment styles, from long-term strategies and short-term trades to intriguing arbitrage opportunities. We aren't just here to inform; we aim to empower our listeners with knowledge and data-driven analysis. Whether you're looking to understand the broader market trends, or seeking specific stock picks, our podcast provides a comprehensive weekend digest. Dive in with us as we dissect the week's market movements, share research-backed investment ideas, and navigate the global financial maze. Join the journey to make informed investment decisions and amplify your financial acumen.
